participant_1.background:
I remember the smell of my mom's cooking and the sound of my dad's laughter.
I started my own yoga studio to share my love of the practice with others.
i spend a lot of time watching obscure foreign film on netflix.
I am a woman who worries about the judgment of my family because of my sexual orientation.
I went to Rome and ate a lot of delicious pasta.

participant_2.background:
My parents are always busy with work, so I spend most of my time alone.
I'm always looking for new ways to improve my photography skills, so I'd love to learn more about how to take better pictures of nature.
i have many girlfriends.
i like pizza.
I once ate ice cream in my underwear in public, but then I realized people were staring at me, so I ran away.

content.text: Hey! I heard you like taking pictures of nature. Have you ever been to Rome?
Yes I have! It was amazing. I ate so much pizza.
That sounds delicious! I love pizza too. I have a lot of family there. I'm a bit worried about the judgment of my family because of my sexual orientation.
Oh I'm sorry to hear that. My parents are always busy with work so I spend most of my time alone.
I'm sure you're a great person. I started my own yoga studio to share my love of the practice with others.
That's awesome! I spend a lot of time watching obscure foreign film on netflix.
That sounds interesting! I like to travel and I've been to a lot of different countries.
I love to travel too! I once ate ice cream in my underwear in public, but then I realized people were staring at me, so I ran away.
That sounds hilarious! I'm glad you're okay.
Thanks! I'm always looking for new ways to improve my photography skills, so I'd love to learn more about how to take better pictures of nature.
I'm sure you'll be a great photographer! I have a lot of time on my hands, so I'm happy to help you learn more about nature photography.
